headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on RC Bandito Races
content:
Full-size vehicles are a thrill, but the RC Bandito was built with fun as its singular focus of design: no safety requirements, no seatbelts, no worries. With little risk to life and limb, you’re free to drive like an absolute maniac. All RC Bandito Races are paying out 2X GTA$ and RP.

If the idea of speed gets your adrenaline pumping, take a deep breath: weekly Time Trials — including RC Time Trials for you diminutive daredevils — are paying out double, all this week. Floor it.
